ralgorithm

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • ralgorithm.Wall

  • public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
    Wall class that represents a level of Modules in a robot

    The wall is used to move in a direction, while bringing Modules that can be moved in that direction with it, as it updates.

    An example of a Wall level can be seen as follows:

    ABCD
    EF GH

    With the above robot if the wall was at level 1, with dir 2 (down) the wall would consist of modules {A,B,C,D,null} and then we could mark the moving modules as {false,false,true,false,false} because C is the only Module that can move down with the wall. One could then use this information to slide Module C down and update the wall

    Since:
    2/14/2016
